column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I wasn't a fan of Lou Malnati's until they moved into the Oak Park community.  I have to say
column2: I now enjoy their thin crust
column4: as I like it simple.  I also love the ambiance of the dining area which can accommodate small or large parties. The sliding doors makes it fun to dine during the summer
column5: especially when you want the feeling of dining al fresco. I recently discovered their "back door store" which offers half-baked and frozen pizzas.  Great addition to the Oak Park community.
